div.head: Report:
div.p: The expected results, i.e., time resolved SAXS/WAXD during i-PP mesophase crystallization, could not be obtained.
The reason is a series of technical problems with the used device (NOT provided by ESRF).

In essence, the device executes a "temperature-jump": the sample is rapidly moved from a hot to a cold zone, to achieve rapid cooling. However, the thermal contact between the sample and the temperature controlled stages was not optimal. This prevented us to achieve the required cooling rate to obtain formation of the mesophase (i.e., around 150 Â°C/s).
Moreover, other technical problems occurred in the data acquistion. Because of a software problems, the acquired SAXS patterns were not readable.
